form.name: feeding_a_sick_child_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding> Feeding a Sick Child Two

field.name: Use Iodated salt for good health
Wash hands with soap and water before preparing food or feeding your child

It is always important to feed your child [6 months and older] with foods and fruits that would help him/her to grow well and stay healthy. Foods can be mashed, fruits can also be mashed, cut up or squeezed into juice.
NB: Feeding child with variety of foods/fruits only starts from the age of 6 months
